title: How do I block the animated notification question?
content: When I go to a website that can push notifications, next to the url there's this animation that you can click to allow the notifications. I want to turn off this animation. This question has been asked before and the answer was: "Go to about:config and set dom.webnotifications.enabled = false". I did this, but I still have the animation. What should i do?
creator: schackmann

title: Iconos marcadores
content: De vez en cuando al iniciar Firefox se pierden todos los iconos de los marcadores (favicon). Es una pregunta que he visto en varios sitios pero que nadie da una solución. Sé que entrando en la página web del marcador se recargará el icono, pero hacer eso es inviable cuando se tienen gran cantidad de marcadores guardados y clasificados en carpetas y subcarpetas. ¿Por qué Firefox tiene este error tan común?, ¿hay alguna forma de guardar personalmente dichos iconos para restaurarlos cuando Firefox los haya perdido?
creator: xfargas

title: URLs in GET parameters changed in private mode
content:
When in private mode URLs get changed, leading to unexpected results:

http://scripting.com/?url=https://google.com

Will be rewritten to

http://scripting.com/?url=http://google.com

How to reproduce: 1. open a private window 2. enter the example URL (Using Dave Winers non-https as he's an advocate) 3. see the result in the URL bar (the second scheme is changed from https to http)

This only happens when the param has https and the request URL has not (other combinations did not lead to changes). Other browsers did not show this behavior.
creator: firefox2147

title: Can't see thumbnals when uploading images to Flickr
content:
For the last few days, I have been unable to see the thumbnails of images that I want to upload to Flickr. The problem does not happen if I use Edge.

I have tried the usual fixes of clearing cache and cookies etc. What else can I try, or is this a bug that needs fixing?
creator: n.whetstone

title: Not a single website loading
content:
Frankly this issue is mostly my fault and has an easy fix but I would like to avoid that.

Whenever I launch firefox none of my tabs load and even waiting for 2 hours did not make them load. Restarting my computer did not help. My bookmarks bar just looks empty with no icons and not even any text or buttons in there.

I've tried setting network.http.http3.enabled to false but that did not fix the issue.

I'm assuming my absurd tab count is the cause of this, but it would be odd since it worked just fine before. I should have around 7900 tabs and the session restore never failed me. Everything I needed loaded relatively quickly too.

My addons seem to work fine, I sometimes get random crashes (though I think this is due to GPU driver issues). Suddenly none of my tabs load which is very unfortunate.

Whenever I go into settings and scroll down to "Firefox Updates" Version 108.0 is stuck at 0 bytes and doesn't seem to download at all.

I would appreciate if I could fix this without losing my session. Thank you for taking the time to read this
creator: mr.oktoruppted5000

Radmir.

title: Greek tones on Reddit
content:
Hi there! I' m unable to tone greek words (the toned letter just disappears) ONLY in the "text field" (not the title field) and ONLY on Reddit (no other forum). The only way to write greek words is when i select "markdown mode" in Reddit's "text field" for posts or replies. I' ve tried in private window with enhanced tracking protection and every add-on disabled with no luck. I' m not facing the same issue with Brave browser, so i decided to ask here for help and no on Reddit support.

title: Tabs Relocated Spontaneously to the Bottom of My Window..
content:
Suddenly today my browser had switched any current tab to the bottom of my window, but it also only lets me see one at a time..which means I can't see multiple tabs open unless I close the current one. My tab bar is gone entirely and was up-top as it's always been, just under the URL box.

I didn't hit any key combos that I know of that would cause this, and I can't seem to find anyone else with the same problem when I search for a solution. Does anyone know what I can do to fix this?? It's very odd and annoying, I've never had it happen before now..

I took a screen-shot of the problem, showing what happens when I open a site or any tab:

Thank you very much for taking a look and any help with this strange issue,

-Chris

title: Tela preta no Instagram
content:
Oi, gente. Tudo bem? Estou com um problema recorrente em um site em específico: o Instagram.

O navegador do Firefox aparentemente está dando um problema comigo quando eu vou assistir stories ou assistir um video de uma postagem. Ele aparece uma tela preta e somente reproduz o áudio. Testei outros navegadores, mas todos estão reproduzindo normalmente, menos o Firefox que eu mais uso. Gostaria de saber por que só com ele está assim? Tentei usar em modo privativo, mas não deu certo também.

Gostaria de uma ajuda, por favor para solucionar este problema.
